name: Runners (orriaxels)
description:
This is a two player platform-racing game. 

The BLUE player moves with A and D, and jumps with S. 

The RED player moves with J and L, and jumps with K

You have two minutes to reach the end before the times run out. If the time runs out the player who has gotten farthest will win!

This is a school project and I made this game with:
https://shoshan.itch.io and https://hallur.itch.io
